description: This Python script provides functions to extract and format version information from a given data structure, supporting both list and string formats for specifying versions.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts a version list (major, minor, patch) from the input info dictionary, handling different version representations.

parameters.name: info
parameters.description: Dictionary containing version information, with 'version' key as list or string.

methods.returns: List of integers representing major, minor, and patch versions.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string based on the version list obtained from GetVersion.
